meanings.definition: Partially conscious; not fully awake or aware.
meanings.sent1: After the surgery, she was semiconscious and slowly regained full awareness.
meanings.sent2: He was semiconscious during the boring lecture and kept nodding off.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked semiconscious after eating too much catnip and lounged lazily on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The city was semiconscious in the early hours of the morning, with only a few lights flickering in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The semiconscious patient mumbled incoherently, unable to fully grasp his surroundings.

meanings.definition: In a state of impaired consciousness.
meanings.sent1: The injured hiker was semiconscious and unable to walk without assistance.
meanings.sent2: She felt semiconscious after taking the strong pain medication prescribed by the doctor.
meanings.sent3: The semiconscious driver accidentally hit the brakes instead of the accelerator, causing a moment of confusion.
meanings.sent4: The storm left the town semiconscious, with power outages and debris blocking the roads.
meanings.sent5: The semiconscious student struggled to focus on the exam questions, his mind clouded by fatigue.
